text: "Broken" is a song by American DJ duo Slander and Los Angeles-based dubstep producer Kompany. English record label Never Say Die released it on August 16, 2019. ==Background and release== On August 16, 2019, the song was released as a digital download on international digital stores through English record label Never Say Die, as well as being released through various music streaming services. ==Critical reception== "Broken" was well received by most critics. Harry Levin of Dancing Astronaut called the song "nothing but heavy all the way through", writing that the vocals sounded like they were floating on top of a "soundtrack to a war between two robotic alien races." Writing for DJ Times, Brian Bonavoglia stated that Slander showcased their production skill with Kompany to create a "riveting anthem" that touches on the former's "trademark melodic touch". Noiseporn's Jeanette Kats praised the song, specifically its sound design, drums, and vocals and described the second drop as having a "beautifully crafted chord progressions". Austria Masim of EDMTunes stated that the song was a "passionate force of synergetic ferocity and anguish", with all artists involved with the song encompassing the "embodiment of bloodthirsty fierceness as the track". ==Track listing== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Region !Date !Format !Version !Label ! |- | scope="row" |Worldwide | August 16, 2019 | Digital download | "Broken" | Never Say Die | |} ==References== Category:2019 singles Category:2019 songs Category:Electronic songs Category:Dubstep songs Category:Slander songs
title: Broken (Slander and Kompany song)
